_header: Father I am Thine own child
_description: Nolo mortem peccatoris — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Fadyr my wyll yt is / Nolo mortem peccatoris’

CamStJohn259.First Lines:
ffadyr I am þin owyn chylde& born of mary meke &
                    myld…
CamStJohn259.Last Lines:
…þis is goddis owyn word ywysNolo mortem
                        peccatoris
CamStJohn259.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  G. C. Macaulay, eds.  
             “Fifteenth Century Carols and Other Pieces.” 
             Modern Language Review
         8 (1913): 68-87: 79-80.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 190-1; 1977, 168.
